Room.Name: Hillcrest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillcrest Drive, admiring the splendor of the Allakaren Pyramid.
Room.LongDescription: The large Allakaren Pyramid stands high above the city as it towers towards the sky, surpassing even the City Walls in height. The Pyramid has withstood the various ravages of time, and remains standing even centuries after Pharaoh Allakaren was buried deep within its chambers. Rumor has it that the Pharaoh still wanders the halls of his Pyramid, trying to find the people who have stolen treasure from his tomb.
